function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Poor living and sanitary conditions in slums leading to difficulty in containing the spread of covid-19","Lack of access to medical care and basic services in informal developments","Presence of covid-19 and other viruses in the sewage system","Drugs used for treatment of covid-19 patients may pollute freshwater resources","Coronavirus can spread through fecal-oral routes, requiring proper management of urban water cycle","Lack of sewage treatment facilities in densely populated areas like india poses challenges for containing the spread of covid-19 through water sources","Reduction of anthropogenic activities leading to improved water quality","Decrease in tourism activities leading to improved water quality in venice","Reduction in agricultural and industrial activities leading to improved groundwater quality in tuticorin, india","Air pollution serving as a carrier for the virus","Positive linear relationship between temperature and the number of covid-19 cases","Drier air favors the transmission of the virus","Limited and inconclusive evidence regarding the impact of wind speed on covid-19 infections","Variability of covid-19 transmission rates based on climatic conditions","Limited literature on cities and pandemics","Increased frequency of pandemics due to climate change and human encroachment into wildlife habitats","Smart city technologies may not be uniformly accessible, leading to inequitable distribution of benefits and access to pandemic response tools","Misinformation spread through smart city platforms and technologies may exacerbate the spread of pandemics and hinder control efforts","Dependence on smart city technologies for pandemic response may lead to over-reliance and complacency in traditional public health measures","Reliance on high internet connectivity for telemedicine and teleworking","Potential for increased privacy and safety concerns in telemedicine","Reliance on telemedicine as a substitute for all in-person clinic visits","Increased reliance on teleworking may lead to reduced face-to-face interactions, impacting social connections and mental well-being","Exclusion of certain career groups from teleworking may create disparities and inequalities in access to remote work opportunities","Increased reliance on digital platforms and automation may lead to potential cybersecurity threats and vulnerabilities","Shortage of key logistical equipment such as masks, face shields, gloves, and testing kits in hospitals","Rapid manufacturing of portable isolation units using 3-d printing technology","Use of drones for monitoring compliance with social distancing measures and detecting potentially infected individuals"]}
